headline: 3 Reasons ODFL is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Old Dominion Freight Line’s shares have sunk to $151.78, producing a disappointing 11.9% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 10.5% gain. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
